description: Your Excellency Mr. Ismail Karimov, President of the Republic of Uzbekistan, Leaders of the Members States of Shanghai Cooperation Organization; Invited Leaders Excellencies, Ladies and Gentlemen Al
caption: narendramodi.in
message:
My remarks at the SCO Summit focused on the rich potential of what the SCO can achieve & how India will gain from the strengths of the SCO. 

Highlighted the need to adopt zero tolerance to terror & the need for a comprehensive approach to fight terrorism at all levels. India will be a productive partner in building strong trade, transport, energy, digital & people-to-people links. http://www.narendramodi.in/text-of-pm-s-address-at-sco-summit-june-24-2016--485676
